scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of letters from James Fenimore Cooper to J. Bromme and Madame de Mirbel.

did.unittitle: James Fenimore Cooper to J. Bromme, 20 May 1830

scopecontent.p: Cooper to J. Bromme. This is not found in James Franlkin Beard's Letters and Journals of James Fenimore Cooper.
Fragment of a note, authenticated by F.G. Flugel.

did.unittitle: James Fenimore Cooper to Madame de Mirbel, n.d.
